014
015package org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.definitions;
016
017import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkNotNull;
018import static com.google.common.base.Preconditions.checkState;
019
020import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.FieldContext;
021import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.ValueCache;
022import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.ValueProvider;
023import org.basepom.mojo.propertyhelper.fields.NumberField;
024
025import java.io.IOException;
026import java.util.Objects;
027import java.util.StringJoiner;
028
029import com.google.common.annotations.VisibleForTesting;
030
031public class NumberDefinition extends FieldDefinition<String> {
032
033    public static final String INITIAL_VALUE = "0";
034
035    /**
036     * If a multi-number, which field to increment. Field injected by Maven.
037     */
038    int fieldNumber = 0;
039
040    /**
041     * Increment of the property when changing it. Field injected by Maven.
042     */
043    int increment = 1;
044
045    public NumberDefinition() {
046        initialValue = INITIAL_VALUE;
047    }
048
049    @VisibleForTesting
050    NumberDefinition(String id) {
051        super(id);
052        initialValue = INITIAL_VALUE;
053    }
054
055
056    public int getFieldNumber() {
057        return fieldNumber;
058    }
059
060    public int getIncrement() {
061        return increment;
062    }
063
064    @Override
065    public void check() {
066        super.check();
067        checkState(getInitialValue().isPresent(), "initial value must be defined");
068        checkState(fieldNumber >= 0, "the field number must be >= 0");
069    }
070
071    @Override
072    public NumberField createField(FieldContext context, ValueCache valueCache) throws IOException {
073        checkNotNull(context, "context is null");
074        checkNotNull(valueCache, "valueCache is null");
075
076        check();
077
078        final ValueProvider numberValue = valueCache.getValueProvider(this);
079        return NumberField.forTesting(this, numberValue);
080    }
081
082    @Override
083    public String toString() {
084        return new StringJoiner(", ", NumberDefinition.class.getSimpleName() + "[", "]")
085            .add("fieldNumber=" + fieldNumber)
086            .add("increment=" + increment)
087            .add(super.toString())
088            .toString();
089    }
090
091    @Override
092    public boolean equals(Object o) {
093        if (this == o) {
094            return true;
095        }
096        if (o == null || getClass() != o.getClass()) {
097            return false;
098        }
099        if (!super.equals(o)) {
100            return false;
101        }
102        NumberDefinition that = (NumberDefinition) o;
103        return fieldNumber == that.fieldNumber && increment == that.increment;
104    }
105
106    @Override
107    public int hashCode() {
108        return Objects.hash(super.hashCode(), fieldNumber, increment);
109    }
110}
